Under the Skin

Ano: 2013

IMDb ID: tt1441395

Classificação: 6.3

Sinopse: An alien entity inhabits the earthly form of a young woman who combs the roads and streets of Scotland in search of the human prey she came to plunder. She seduces her isolated and forsaken male victims into an otherworldly dimension where they are stripped and consumed. However, existence in all its complexity begin to change the alien visitor. She begins to discover herself as human with tragic and terrifying consequences.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
